item.description:
This will be our third meeting! So lets spice it up! (more details coming soon!)

Please bring:

A RAW VEGAN DISH (and ingredient list or full recipe to share)
A plate and/or big bowl, a cup & utensils
Before Pictures (if you have some that you would like to share)
Your open heart & mind

Voicemail 1-866-625-0082
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the rear of the building next to the parking spaces and enter through th
item.why: Because raw food is cool, and when you eat raw food, you are even cooler ;-)

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be! Happy Harvest
